titleStmt.title: The militant Christian, or, The good soldier of Jesus Christ described in his arms compleat : as also the hardness of this service, on 2 Tim., 2, 3 : together with the words of command, many precious encouragements and directions how to please Christ his captain, and how to crown his profession by being best in the worst of times / by a Low-countrey soldier dwelling in the kingdom, tribulation, and patience of our Lord Jesus Christ.
titleStmt.author: Coven, Stephen.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
